description.narrative: By 2014, programme partners at central and decentralised levels apply results based management, human rights based approach, gender and emergency response preparation for planning, implementing and monitoring policies and programmes, which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Public Finance And Local Governance, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Economic and social policies and programs are monitored, results based and contribute to the reduction of disparities, vulnerabilities and poverty of children and women

description.narrative: Efforts focused on (i) increasing capacity of key Government officials on gender sensitive budgeting and partnerships to improve allocations for gender-related interventions; (ii) finalising the CPD 2018-2020 approved in September 2017; and (iii) setting up a pilot to strengthen participatory local development planning. | Status:Met | As-of Date:26/03/2018
